derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from French, from Middle Dutch dūne; related to Old English dūn 'hill' (see down)

entry.def: A dune is a hill of sand near the sea or in a desert.

means.word_mean: 1. a ridge of sand created by the wind; found in deserts or near lakes and oceans
